extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to copy title and URL of selected tabs to the clipboard.

command_copySelectedTabs_message.message: Choose the format you want selected tabs to be copied as.

command_copyTree_message.message: Choose the format you want this tree to be copied as.

command_copyTreeDescendants_message.message: Choose the format you want descendant tabs to be copied as.

notification_copied_message.message:
A tab is copied to the clipboard as:

$COPIED$

notification_copied_multiple_message.message:
$COUNT$ tabs are copied to the clipboard as:

$COPIED$

notification_failedToCopy_title.message: Failed to copy tabs to the clipboard.

error_discarded_author.message: (Error: couldn't get author information from discarded tab)

error_discarded_description.message: (Error: couldn't get description information from discarded tab)

error_discarded_keywords.message: (Error: couldn't get keywords information from discarded tab)

error_unpermitted_author.message: (Error: couldn't get author information from unpermitted tab)

error_unpermitted_description.message: (Error: couldn't get description information from unpermitted tab)

error_unpermitted_keywords.message: (Error: couldn't get keywords information from unpermitted tab)

error_failed_author.message: (Error: couldn't get author information from the tab content [$ERROR$])

error_failed_description.message: (Error: couldn't get description information from the tab content [$ERROR$])

error_failed_keywords.message: (Error: couldn't get keywords information from the tab content [$ERROR$])

config_copyToClipboardFormats_restoreDef.message: Restore default formats keeping added formats

config_copyToClipboardFormats_accesskey.message: A non-whitespace character next to "&" (for example "L" in "&Location") in the label will become the accesskey for the item.

config_copyToClipboardFormats_placeholde.message:
Available place holders for formats:
%URL%=Page URL,
%TITLE%=Page Title,
%URL_HTMLIFIED%=URL escaped for HTML,
%TITLE_HTMLIFIED%=Title escaped for HTML,
%TST_INDENT(indenter)%, %TST_INDENT(indenter1)(indenter2)...(indenterN)%=Indent (powered by Tree Style Tab)
%TAB%=Tab,
%EOL%=Line Feed

Place holders based on page contents (you need to grant required permission):
%AUTHOR%=Author name (specified by META),
%DESCRIPTION%=Description (specified by META),
%KEYWORDS%=Search keywords (specified by META),
%AUTHOR_HTMLIFIED%=Author name escaped for HTML,
%DESCRIPTION_HTMLIFIED%=Description escaped for HTML,
%KEYWORDS_HTMLIFIED%=Search keywords escaped for HTML,
%RT%=Copy as a rich text (Note: this placeholder itself is cleared from the copied text)

There is one more epecial placeholder function: %REPLACE("base text", "match pattern regular expression 1", "replaced text 1", "match pattern regular expression 2", "replaced text 2", ...)% It will useful for post-edit of placeholder values. 
For example: 
%REPLACE("%URL%", "\?.*$", "")% 
 => URL with stripped query parameters 
%REPLACE("%URL%", "^((?!\w+://([^/]*\.)?(google\.com|duckduckgo\.com)/.*).*)\?.*$", "$$1")% 
 => URL with stripped query parameters, except Google and DuckDuckGo

config_howToActivateNativeRichTextCopy_d.message: If you hope to use any rich text format with less troubles, you should go to "about:config" and set "dom.events.asyncClipboard.dataTransfer" to "true".

config_allUrlsPermissionGranted_label.message: Allow to collect data from page contents / Allow to copy data as rich text format

config_showContextCommandOnTab_label.message: Show context menu item in the context menu on tabs

config_showContextCommandOnPage_label.message: Show context menu item in the context menu on the content area

config_clearSelectionAfterCommandInvoked.message: Clear selection after a command is invoked

config_reportErrors_label.message: Report errors while internal operations to the clipboard output

config_fallbackForSingleTab_treeDescenda.message: Copy tree descendants (require Tree Style Tab)
